timing.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the skill of doing something at exactly the right time
timing.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He told jokes with an exquisite sense of timing.
He was just walking into the restaurant when we got there. Perfect timing.
timing.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the time when someone does something or when something happens, especially when you are considering how suitable this is
timing.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Ferry schedules and precise timings are subject to weather conditions on the day of departure.
The president and I did not discuss the timing of my departure.
timing.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the way in which electricity is sent to the spark plugs in a car engine
